news_title_1: Real Madrid prepared to fight for FIFA Club World Cup 2025
news_body_1: Real Madrid will compete in the upcoming FIFA Club World Cup 2025 in the USA after winning the UEFA Champions League. Carlo Ancelotti said it is an opportunity to bring pride to fans.
news_title_2: Manchester City confident ahead of the tournament
news_body_2: Manchester Cityâ€™s squad, led by Pep Guardiola, is determined to claim the global title. With stars like Haaland and De Bruyne, fans expect fireworks in the USA.
